warezcdn.name: Agatha Christie no meitantei Poirot to Marple
warezcdn.title: Agasa Kurisutî no meitantei Powaro to Mâpuru

imdb.title: Agasa Kurisutî no meitantei Powaro to Mâpuru
imdb.plot: A teenage girl divides her time between working in London for the famed Belgian sleuth, Hercule Poirot, and staying in the countryside with her shrewd great-aunt, Jane Marple.

episodes.title: Gurando-Metoroporitan no hôseki tônan jiken
episodes.plot: "The Jewel Robbery at the Grand Metropolitan." Teenager Mabel West observes Belgian detective Hercule Poirot as he investigates a robbery at a luxury hotel.

episodes.title: Yasu manshon no nazo
episodes.plot: "The Adventure of the Cheap Flat." While searching for lodging, Mabel stumbles into a mystery that interests Poirot.

episodes.title: Fûgawari na yuigon
episodes.plot: "Strange Jest." Mabel helps her great-aunt Jane Marple search for a missing inheritance.

episodes.title: Môshiwake no nai meido
episodes.plot: "The Case of the Perfect Maid." Mabel's great-aunt Marple tries to prove the innocence of a parlormaid accused of stealing.

episodes.title: ABC satsujin jiken (sono ichi) Powaro e no chôsenjô
episodes.plot: "The ABC Murders, Part 1: A Written Challenge to Poirot." An anonymous letter challenges Poirot to solve a mystery that will occur later that month.

episodes.title: ABC satsujin jiken (sono ni) B no machi de, B no na no hito ga
episodes.plot: "The ABC Murders, Part 2: B's the Place, B's the Name of the Person." Poirot, Hastings, Mabel, and police Inspector Sharpe continue the investigation.

episodes.title: ABC satsujin jiken (sono san) Hannin arawaru
episodes.plot: "The ABC Murders, Part 3: The Culprit Appears." Poirot discovers a previously overlooked clue that links the cases together.

episodes.title: ABC satsujin jiken (sono yon) Powaro, nazo o toku
episodes.plot: "The ABC Murders, Part 4: Poirot Solves the Mystery." Poirot and his team catch the ABC serial-killer.

episodes.title: Sôridaijin no shissô (zenpen) Dôbâ-kaikyô no tsuiseki
episodes.plot: "The Kidnapped Prime Minister, Part 1: Pursuit in the Dover Strait." Poirot is called away on a top secret case.

episodes.title: Sôridaijin no shissô (kôhen) Shinjitsu wa Igirisu
episodes.plot: "The Kidnapped Prime Minister, Part 2: The Truth is in England." Poirot and his team embark on a perilous journey.

episodes.title: Ejiputo-funbo no nazo (zenpen) Kodai kara no chôsenjô
episodes.plot: "The Adventure of the Egyptian Tomb, Part 1: A Written Challenge from Ancient Times." Poirot and his team investigate mysterious deaths linked to a curse.

episodes.title: Ejiputo-funbo no nazo (zenpen) Kodai kara no chôsenjô
episodes.plot: "The Adventure of the Egyptian Tomb, Part 2: The Curse of Pharoah Men-her-Ra." Poirot, Hastings, and Mabel search for a murderer on an archaeological dig.

episodes.title: Makijaku satsujin jiken
episodes.plot: "The Tape-Measure Murder." Miss Marple and her niece Mabel investigate a strangulation in St. Mary Mead.

episodes.title: Kinkai jiken
episodes.plot: "Ingots of Gold." Miss Marple tells the story of a mysterious incident involving Mabel's father, Raymond West.

episodes.title: Aoi zeraniumu
episodes.plot: "The Blue Geranium." Miss Marple and Mabel investigate a fortuneteller's warning.

episodes.title: Endo Hausu kai jiken (sono ichi) Pâtî no yoru ni
episodes.plot: "Peril at End House, Part 1: The Night of the Party." While Mabel, Poirot, and Hastings are holidaying, they meet an heiress whose life is in danger.

episodes.title: Endo Hausu kai jiken (sono ni) Himerareta koi
episodes.plot: "Peril at End House, Part 2: Concealed Love." Poirot finds a link between a famous pilot's recent disappearance and the crimes at End House.

episodes.title: Endo Hausu kai jiken (sono san) kanpeki na shôko
episodes.plot: "Peril at End House, Part 3: Irrefutable Evidence." After a shocking tragedy, Poirot and his detective team gather the suspects for questioning.

episodes.title: Kurisumasu pudingu no bôken (zenpen) Purinsu kara no Irai
episodes.plot: "The Adventure of the Christmas Pudding, Part 1: A Commission from a Prince." Poirot and his team are sent to investigate a mystery at a Christmas party.

episodes.title: Kurisumasu pudingu no bôken (kôhen) ôke ni tsutawaru rubî
episodes.plot: "The Adventure of the Christmas Pudding, Part 2: The Royal Family's Ruby." All the pieces of the puzzle come together and Poirot finds a satisfactory solution.

episodes.title: Padinton Hatsu yonjigojûbun (sono ichi) Satsujinsha no Noru Ressha
episodes.plot: "4.50 From Paddington, Part 1: The Train a Murderer Rides." Great-aunt Marple's friend Elspeth McGillicuddy witnesses a murder on a train.

episodes.title: Padinton Hatsu yonjigojûbun (sono ni) Shinobiyoru kage
episodes.plot: "4.50 From Paddington, Part 2: The Creeping Shadow." While working undercover, Mabel discovers a dead body hidden at Rutherford Hall.

episodes.title: Padinton Hatsu yonjigojûbun (sono san) Shinpuru na dôki
episodes.plot: "4.50 From Paddington, Part 3: A Simple Motive." The killer strikes again at Rutherford Hall.

episodes.title: Padinton Hatsu yonjigojûbun (sono yon) Mâpuru tai hannin
episodes.plot: "4.50 From Paddington, Part 4: Marple vs. the Culprit." Miss Marple invites Mrs. McGillicuddy to Rutherford Hall, where the killer is identified.

episodes.title: Purimasu-yuki kyûkô-ressha (zenpen) Kyakushitsunai no shitai
episodes.plot: "The Plymouth Express, Part 1: A Body in a Carriage." The dead body of a woman is found underneath a train seat, and Poirot is hired to solve the mystery.

episodes.title: Purimasu yuki kyûkô-ressha (kôhen) Burû no wanpîsu
episodes.plot: "The Plymouth Express, Part 2: The Blue Dress." Mabel and Inspector Sharpe visit the scene of the crime; Poirot puts the clues together.

episodes.title: Dôki to kikai
episodes.plot: "Motive versus Opportunity." Marple and Mabel hear of a curious crime where those with motive had no opportunity, yet those with opportunity had no motive.

episodes.title: Kieta ryôrinin (zenpen) Gôin na irai
episodes.plot: "The Adventure of the Clapham Cook, Part 1: An Aggressive Request." Poirot is hired to finding a missing cook.

episodes.title: Kieta ryôrinin (kôhen) Toranku no himitsu
episodes.plot: "The Adventure of the Clapham Cook, Part 2: The Secret of the Trunk." The missing cook is located and Poirot uncovers a sinister plot.

episodes.title: Surîpingu mâdâ (sono ichi) Nemureru satsujin jiken
episodes.plot: "Sleeping Murder, Part 1: Sleeping Murder Incident." Gwenda tells Miss Marple and Mabel that she has had strange premonitions concerning her new house.

episodes.title: Surîpingu mâdâ (sono ni) Kioku no tobira
episodes.plot: "Sleeping Murder, Part 2: The Door of Memory." Miss Marple and Mabel assist Gwenda in investigating her stepmother who disappeared 18 years earlier.

episodes.title: Surîpingu mâdâ (sono san) Heren no koi
episodes.plot: "Sleeping Murder, Part 3: What Helen Loved." Miss Marple, Mabel, and Gwenda investigate three men who may have been romantically linked to Helen.

episodes.title: Surîpingu mâdâ (sono yon) Semarikuru ma no te
episodes.plot: "Sleeping Murder, Part 4: The Evil Outstretched Hand." Gwenda's life is in danger when she realizes the truth about her stepmother.

episodes.title: Nijûyon-wa no kuro-tsugumi
episodes.plot: "Four-and-Twenty Blackbirds." Poirot investigates the death of a reclusive man whose eating habits provide a clue.

episodes.title: Dabunhaimu shissô jiken
episodes.plot: "The Disappearance of Mr. Davenheim" Poirot wagers that he can solve the case of a missing financier without leaving his office.

episodes.title: Kumo no naka no shi (sono ichi) Sora tobu misshitsu
episodes.plot: "Death in the Clouds, Part 1: The Flying Locked Room." While Poirot sleeps on an airplane flight from Paris to London, a passenger dies.

episodes.title: Kumo no naka no shi (sono ni) Pari no Madamu Jizeru
episodes.plot: Death in the Clouds (Part 2): "Madame Giselle Paris": Poirot, Mabel, Hasting and the Inspector Sharpe return to Paris. During the flight Poirot studied the positions of the occupants and their movements during the flight killer. In Paris they discover that someone arranged for Madame Giselle was on that flight from Paris. All his fortune will be left to her only daughter was left for adoption for unknown reasons. The Count of Horbury is being blackmailed by his wife who takes money from Madame Giselle to pay his gambling debts.

episodes.title: Kumo no naka no shi (sono san) Hôbari-fujin e no kyôhaku
episodes.plot: Death in the Clouds (Part 3): "A Threat to Mrs. Horbury.": All turn out to meet following the "Writer", Mr. Clancy. Poirot asks that Mr. Gale simulate a extortion with Ms. Horbury. Mabel, Poirot and Miss Jane Gray travel again to Paris to unravel the mystery. Mr. Dupont accepts the hint of Poirot to take Miss Jane Gray in his next excavation in Persia. The only daughter of Madame Giselle who inherits an immense fortune appears.

episodes.title: Kumo no naka no shi (sono yon) Bakudai na isan no sôzokunin
episodes.plot: Death in the Clouds (Part 4): "The Heiress of Immense Fortune": After remember that there was already found the daughter of Madame Giselle in flight she was dead, Poirot realizes that she is in great risk of dying, but Mabel he had already left to accompany her to the Grand Hotel and realizes then that she was passing in a taxi with a man going the nearest train station. Inspector Sharpe tries to reach the girl. Poirot gathers all involved to tell what happened on the flight and unravel the mystery.
